languages.text: "{name}". {n}Маражай проводит пальцем по оружию, не отрывая взгляда от перепуганных людей.{/n} "Живое мясо... слишком говорливо". {n}В темных глазах друкари появляется голод.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{name}". {n}Маражай проводит пальцем по оружию, не отрывая взгляда от перепуганных людей.{/n} "Живое мясо... слишком говорливо". {n}В темных глазах друкари появляется голод.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai runs a finger along the edge of his blade, his eyes trained on the frightened crew.{/n} "The meat... is too loud." {n}Hunger ignites in the Drukhari's eyes.{/n}

languages.text: « {name}. » {n}Marazhai glisse son doigt le long du plat de sa lame, les yeux rivés sur l'équipage apeuré.{/n} « Le gibier... est trop bavard. » {n}Une lueur carnassière brûle dans les yeux du Drukhari.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai runs a finger along the edge of his blade, his eyes trained on the frightened crew.{/n} "The meat... is too loud." {n}Hunger ignites in the Drukhari's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {name}. » {n}Marazhai glisse son doigt le long du plat de sa lame, les yeux rivés sur l'équipage apeuré.{/n} « Le gibier... est trop bavard. » {n}Une lueur carnassière brûle dans les yeux du Drukhari.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: 「{name}」{n}マラズハイは刃先に指をかけて、怯えるクルーを凝視する。{/n}「この肉の塊は…うるさすぎる」{n}デュカーリの目に飢えの光が宿る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai runs a finger along the edge of his blade, his eyes trained on the frightened crew.{/n} "The meat... is too loud." {n}Hunger ignites in the Drukhari's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「{name}」{n}マラズハイは刃先に指をかけて、怯えるクルーを凝視する。{/n}「この肉の塊は…うるさすぎる」{n}デュカーリの目に飢えの光が宿る。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: “{name}。”{n}玛拉斋用手指划着刀刃的边缘，双眼死死地盯着惊恐的船员。{/n}“这头活畜……太吵了。”{n}他的目光中充满了饥渴。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai runs a finger along the edge of his blade, his eyes trained on the frightened crew.{/n} "The meat... is too loud." {n}Hunger ignites in the Drukhari's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “{name}。”{n}玛拉斋用手指划着刀刃的边缘，双眼死死地盯着惊恐的船员。{/n}“这头活畜……太吵了。”{n}他的目光中充满了饥渴。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai streicht mit dem Finger über die Kante seiner Klinge, die Augen auf die verängstigte Crew gerichtet.{/n} "Das Fleisch ... ist zu laut." {n}Hunger entflammt in den Augen des Drukhari.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai runs a finger along the edge of his blade, his eyes trained on the frightened crew.{/n} "The meat... is too loud." {n}Hunger ignites in the Drukhari's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai streicht mit dem Finger über die Kante seiner Klinge, die Augen auf die verängstigte Crew gerichtet.{/n} "Das Fleisch ... ist zu laut." {n}Hunger entflammt in den Augen des Drukhari.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: «{name}». {n}Marazhai pasa un dedo por el filo de su espada, sin apartar la vista de la asustada tripulación.{/n} «La carne... hace demasiado ruido». {n}Hay voracidad en la mirada del Drukhari.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai runs a finger along the edge of his blade, his eyes trained on the frightened crew.{/n} "The meat... is too loud." {n}Hunger ignites in the Drukhari's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «{name}». {n}Marazhai pasa un dedo por el filo de su espada, sin apartar la vista de la asustada tripulación.{/n} «La carne... hace demasiado ruido». {n}Hay voracidad en la mirada del Drukhari.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai, bir parmağını kılıcının sırtında gezdiriyor. Gözleri, korkmuş mürettebata kilitlenmiş durumda.{/n} "Etlerin... Sesi çok çıkıyor." {n}Drukhari'nin gözlerinde açlık kıvılcımları çakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai runs a finger along the edge of his blade, his eyes trained on the frightened crew.{/n} "The meat... is too loud." {n}Hunger ignites in the Drukhari's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai parmaklarının birini kılıcının keskin tarafında gezdiriyor. Gözleri, korkmuş mürettebata kilitlenmiş durumda.{/n} "Etlerin... Sesi çok çıkıyor." {n}Drukhari'nin gözlerinde açlık kıvılcımları yanıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
